ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound mini red potatoes, cut into 1-inch pieces
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Chicken thighs are more forgiving than breasts and stay juicy when baked
Cut potatoes uniformly so they cook at the same rate as chicken
Reserve some pesto to mix in after cooking for fresh flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Do you prefer chicken thighs or breasts? Thighs are darker meat and stay moist better. How do you usually judge when baked chicken is done?
